title: Death By Lightning: Michael Shannon & Matthew Macfadyen in Explosive Presidential Assassination Series
shortdescription: Game of Thrones creators tackle the forgotten Garfield assassination – critics call it 'masterful'.
author: TV Insider

content.content: /images/Death By Lightning Michael Shannon & Matthew Macfadyen in Explosive.webp

From the minds behind Game of Thrones comes Netflix’s most ambitious historical drama yet: Death By Lightning — the true story of President James A. Garfield’s 1881 assassination by delusional office-seeker Charles Guiteau.

Michael Shannon transforms into the doomed, bearded president while Matthew Macfadyen delivers a career-best performance as the unhinged, narcissistic killer. The limited series is already being called “Succession in the Gilded Age.”
With a 100% on Rotten Tomatoes after the first four episodes, critics are predicting Emmy and Golden Globe sweeps — especially for Macfadyen’s chilling courtroom monologue.
